short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scrum GitLab helps you to run Scrum on GitLab issues.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
It makes up for the lack of GitLab features, such as:

- Reject merge request
- Group-level issues
- Cross-project tasks
- Story points

It's free for SaaS: gitlab.com, gitlab.hk, jihulab.com

If you want use it on self-managed GitLab, please visit the website(1024.house) or contact the developer for more information.
long.zh_CN:
它增强了 GitLab 的功能，比如：

- 拒绝合并请求
- 群组级别议题
- 跨项目拆分开发任务
- 故事点

SaaS 用户免费，包括 gitlab.com、gitlab.hk、jihulab.com。

私有化用户：请访问官网（1024.house）或联系作者。
